testcase.name: Navigation
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and Swaglabs is opened...............................passed Then It navigates on to login page..........................................passed

testcase.name: UI
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and Swaglabs is opened...............................passed Then It shows elements on login page........................................passed

testcase.name: Field Validation (Username and Password fields are enabled)
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and Swaglabs is opened...............................passed When User clicks on Username and Password...................................passed Then Username and Password fields are enabled on login page.................passed

testcase.name: Main functionality
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and Swaglabs is opened...............................passed When User enters "standard_user" and "secret_sauce".........................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then It shows home page.....................................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and Swaglabs is opened...............................passed When User enters "standard_user" and "secret_sauce".........................passed And User clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then It shows Home Page.....................................................passed
